segments.text: I can't believe how messy this kitchen is getting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the water is just pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate, not noticing anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's so frustrating to see her just standing in the water like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so reckless, climbing up to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to yell at them to clean up and be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting so slippery, someone is going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing this mess and no one doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, he's going to fall and make everything worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just making me so mad.
segments.speaker: PAR
